name: Channel Visions
description:
Megacable Basic Exchange - Classic 44

Starts out on cruise control but you can pilot at any time.

Made using Pure Data for the audio and Unity for the game stuff.

Controls

ENTER - Autopilot on/off

SHIFT - Hold for faster movement

WASD - Move Around

SPACE - Move Upwards

C - Move Downwards

ESC - Quit
